name: STEREOGRAM
description:
A split-screen platformer in a broken world
Featuring 100 rooms spread across 6 zones

Having trouble viewing stereograms? Unfortunately not everyone is able to see stereograms, but the following is a technique that might help some people

Relax your eyes until the two rectangles above fully overlap, at which point you should see a square coming out of the screen

(some people achieve this by moving their face close to the screen, until the images overlap, and then slowly moving their face away)

Stereograms can also be viewed by going cross-eyed. The game has a toggle for this as well as other accessibility options

More information can be found in README.txt or on Wikipedia

Stereograms can be quite taxing on the eyes! Please take regular breaks, letting your eyes recover each time before continuing the game
